meanings.definition: The quality or state of being different or distinct from something else.
meanings.sent1: The otherness of the new student made them stand out in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: Her otherness in fashion choices always attracted attention.
meanings.sent3: The otherness of the purple cow in the field made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The otherness of her perspective on the issue was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The otherness of the exotic bird's feathers was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: An individual or thing that is different or distinct from oneself or others.
meanings.sent1: The book's main character represented the otherness that the author wanted to explore.
meanings.sent2: He felt a sense of otherness when surrounded by people with different beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The otherness of the alien in the movie was both scary and funny.
meanings.sent4: Her unique style was an expression of her otherness in a sea of conformity.
meanings.sent5: The otherness of the rare flower made it a prized possession.
